name: Forest Sonica
description:
Play the HangDrum to the sounds of birds & a river flowing nearby

you also have the option to jam with a backing track which currently includes a drum pattern and a pad!

Use both hands, the right one for percussion on the arrow keys

and the left one to play a melody on the keys ZXC ASD QWE   , where Z represents the lowest note and E the highest note in the octave! 

Everything made by me in around 3 days for the Music Game Jam 2018, this was the first game I ever  code & my first game jam :D
